description.en: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.ar: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.br: Esta capa retrata uma paisagem noturna de fantasia imaginativa e foi nomeada por DarkWall em Glaphan!
description.cns: 这件披风描绘了一个充满想象的幻想夜景，并被 双足食人鱼上的DarkWall命名！ 它为佩戴者提供 15% 的速度和 100 的 HP 提升。
description.de: Ein verrückter Umhang mit einer Katze, einer Uhr und dem Weltall. Was will man mehr!?
description.fi: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.fil: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.fr: Cette cape dépeint un paysage de nuit imaginaire et fut nommée par DarkWall sur le serveur Glaphan ! Elle confère à son porteur 15% de Vitesse de déplacement et 100 Points de Vie.
description.id: Cloak ini menggambarkan lanskap malam fantasi imajinatif dan dinamai oleh DarkWall di Glaphan! Ini memberi pemakainya 15% Speed dan 100 HP boost.
description.it: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.jp: このマントは想像力豊かなファンタジーの夜の風景を描いており、GlaphanのDarkWallによって名前が付けられました！着用者に速度＋15％とHP＋100。
description.kr: 이 망토는 상상력이 풍부한 판타지 밤 풍경을 묘사하며 Glaphan의 DarkWall에 의해 명명되었습니다! 착용자에게 15% 속도와 100 HP 부스트를 제공합니다.
description.nl: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.pl: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.ru: "...Вскоре по крыше пойдет не спеша, словно в беззвучном, замедленном сне... Вот она! - бархатной ночи душа! - Черная кошка при желтой луне!"
description.sp: ¡Esta capa representa un imaginativo paisaje nocturno de fantasía y fue nombrada por DarkWall en Glaphan! Le da al usuario un 15% de velocidad de movimiento y un aumento de 100 HP.
description.sw: This cloak depicts an imaginative fantasy night landscape and was named by DarkWall on Glaphan! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมนี้แสดงภาพภูมิทัศน์ยามค่ำคืนในจินตนาการและได้รับการตั้งชื่อโดย DarkWall บน Glaphan! ทำให้ผู้สวมใส่มีความเร็ว 15% และบูสต์ 100 HP
description.tw: 描繪了夜空的斗篷，移動速度+15%和HP+100
description.vi: Chiếc áo choàng này mô tả phong cảnh ban đêm đầy sức tưởng tượng và được đặt tên bởi DarkWall on Glaphan! Nó cung cấp cho người mặc 15% Tốc độ và tăng 100 HP.
